title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.11 - Restrictions on ownership by trainer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.11 - Restrictions on ownership by trainer

State Regulations

No licensed trainer shall have any interest, either by
ownership of the horse or by lease of such horse's racing qualities, in a horse
of which he or she is not the trainer and that may be racing at the same race
track where the trainer is licensed and currently racing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
